title: 如何把文件从window复制到CentOS
author: x269361945
txt_content: 1.有没有xshell和xftp这两款软件，官网下载不了。2.还有如何把window的压缩包文件复制到CentOS里面。

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
如果你是 win10 的话，直接命令行下使用 ssh 命令即可

文件发送见这 https://www.cnblogs.com/jiangyao/archive/2011/01/26/1945570.html

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
https://blog.csdn.net/wuludan0217/article/details/84581865

windows添加网络位置
\\server\ip 
cv即可

replies.author: 这里小雨.
replies.txt_content: Xshell我有green版.可以加我q我发你

replies.author: x269361945
replies.txt_content:
LaoguaB 发表于 2020-3-19 19:48
Xshell我有green版.可以加我q我发你
好的 269361945

replies.author: DreamVoid
replies.txt_content:
https://c-t.work/s/1dd59557017042
Xshell安装包
复制文件用ftp或者上面两位大佬的方法就行

replies.author: 撒个
replies.txt_content:
xshell和xftp绿色破解版在这里 https://www.52pojie.cn/thread-1016523-1-1.html
也可以在centos上装一个宝塔面板(www.bt.cn)，集成很多功能，也很方便，文件，备份，ssh，数据库，定时任务等，我也在用，不是推广。。

replies.author: zymooll
replies.txt_content:
我用的WinSCP和XShell
链接：https://pan.baidu.com/s/13tkZHgtkrMBeY5Ndjkxrzg 
提取码：l9j4

replies.author: dad46a54d6
replies.txt_content: 楼主，装一个宝塔面板。建立一个FTP服务器，用FTP工具上传即可
